detail_desc: Sleeveless top in satin with a layer of sequin-embroidered mesh over the front. Back in a viscose weave with buttons at the back of the neck.
Straight-style cardigan in a loose-knit cotton blend with short dolman sleeves. No buttons.
Short shorts in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Short shorts in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Short shorts in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with an elasticated waist and side pockets.

Short shorts in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with an elasticated waist and side pockets.

Short-sleeved shirt in stretch cotton piqué with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and short slits in the sides. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Short-sleeved shirt in stretch cotton piqué with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and short slits in the sides. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Short-sleeved shirt in stretch cotton piqué with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and short slits in the sides. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Calf-length, batik-patterned skirt in Tencel™ lyocell with a tie-front and concealed zip at the back. Lined.

Body in lace and mesh with underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with press-studs.

Body in lace and mesh with underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Shirt in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, flap chest pockets and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Shirt in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, flap chest pockets and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Long nightshirt in a cool, patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long, cuffed sleeves, and a gently rounded hem.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton. Bodysuit in jersey with a button placket and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly with decorative buttons and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of trousers in organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a sewn-on bow tie at the top, sewn-on waistcoat with decorative buttons down the front, and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Long raglan sleeves, a zip down the front that continues along one leg and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.

Shell trousers in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with folded seams, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Shell trousers in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with folded seams, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Pyjama bottoms in a cool, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and straight, wide legs.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in soft, cable-knit organic cotton with buttons on the shoulders, long raglan sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist, straps that cross at the back and have adjustable buttoning at the front, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the dungarees is organic.
Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in jacquard-knit organic cotton with long raglan sleeves, and buttons on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in jacquard-knit organic cotton with long raglan sleeves, and buttons on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in a soft, organic cotton fine knit with adjustable straps that fasten at the front and ribbed hems.
Baby Exclusive. Blouse in an organic cotton weave with buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Baby Exclusive. Blouse in an organic cotton weave with buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, jacquard-knit organic cotton with a round neckline, buttons down the front and contrasting-colour turn-ups at the cuffs.
Warm-lined suede boots with a zip at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and trainer soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Warm-lined hi-tops in suede with leather details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Soft faux fur linings and insoles and sturdy, fluted soles.
Warm-lined hi-tops in suede with leather details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Soft faux fur linings and insoles and sturdy, fluted soles.
Suede loafers with a decorative seam at the front. Leather linings and insoles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.
Leather loafers with leather linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel 3 cm.
Leather loafers with a decorative metal buckle at the front, leather linings and insoles and fluted soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Leather loafers with a decorative metal buckle at the front, leather linings and insoles and fluted soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Slingbacks with pointed toes, covered heels and a heel strap with covered elastication. Leather insoles. Heel approx. 5.5 cm.
Slingbacks with pointed toes, covered heels and a heel strap with covered elastication. Leather insoles. Heel approx. 5.5 cm.
Suede court shoes with pointed toes. a decorative bow at the front and covered heels. Leather linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heel 8 cm.
Suede ankle boots with open toes, decorative gathers at the front, a zip in one side and slim, covered heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel approx. 8.5 cm.
Suede court shoes with covered heels. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Suede court shoes with covered heels. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Suede court shoes with covered heels. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Suede court shoes with covered heels. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Knee-high boots in soft, supple suede with pointed toes. Cotton twill linings and insoles. Covered block heels 8 cm.
Knee-high boots in soft, supple suede with pointed toes. Cotton twill linings and insoles. Covered block heels 8 cm.
Suede boots with a soft shaft, pointed toes and covered heels. Satin and leather linings and leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Sleeveless lace playsuit in a double layer at the top with a cut-out section at the back, concealed press-studs at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the back. Jersey lining.
Playsuit in jersey crêpe with a yoke and short sleeves in lace. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top, side pockets, and a seam at the waist with pleats and a sewn-in tie belt.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck, wrapover top with gentle draping and a seam and sewn-in tie belt at the waist. Cap sleeves, side pockets and gently tapered legs with pleats at the top. Unlined.

LIMITED EDITION. Kaftan in an airy weave containing glittery threads with a round, pleated neckline. Opening at the front with ties at the top, a decorative drawstring on the shoulders and cap sleeves. Two box pleats at the back for added width, and slits in the sides. Chiffon underdress.

LIMITED EDITION. Kaftan dress in patterned satin with a frill-trimmed V-neck and wide, 3/4-length sleeves with a flounced trim. Gathered, concealed elastication at the waist to create soft draping. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.

LIMITED EDITION. Dress in an airy weave with a glittery thread pattern. Frill-trimmed stand-up collar, an opening with ties at the top and long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with a drawstring that ties at one side. Lined.

LIMITED EDITION. Wide dress in an airy jacquard weave with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, a V-neck opening at the front with wide ties and wide sleeves with narrow, concealed elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.Softly draping skirt with frill-trimmed tiers. Lined.
Fitted jacket in slightly stretchy fabric with a satin shawl lapels, a covered button at the front and flap front pockets. Decorative, covered buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.

LIMITED EDITION. Long dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, pleated top, cap sleeves with a decorative drawstring on the shoulders, and a concealed zip at the back. Inset panel at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt with a frill-trimmed seam and flared flounce to the hem. Lined.

LIMITED EDITION. Blouse in silk with a sheen, with concealed buttons down the front and lace sections on the shoulders. Long dolman sleeves, wide, gently rounded cuffs with a covered button, and a gently rounded hem.

LIMITED EDITION. Straight-cut, double-layered top in airy viscose and chiffon crêpe with zigzag edges. Concealed zip at the back, a round neckline and loose, narrow beaded fringes at the top. Slightly longer at the back.

LIMITED EDITION. Shorter-style blouse in crinkled, gathered chiffon. Double layer front and back, and sections in a sturdier weave at the yoke, cuffs and hem. Small opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, balloon sleeves, asymmetric cuffs with a covered button, and covered buttons at the sides of the hem.

LIMITED EDITION. Blouse in airy chiffon with a frilled stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front and a frilled bib front. Long sleeves with vertical frills and wide, flared cuffs with a sparkly stone button and frill trim.
LIMITED EDITION. Jacket in soft velour with soft notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Patch front pockets, long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Satin lining.
LIMITED EDITION. Calf-length, asymmetric skirt in airy chiffon with pleats for added width and draping, and a concealed zip at the back. Chiffon underskirt.
LIMITED EDITION. Wide trousers in a crêpe weave with wide, covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and straight legs with double-layered hems. Partly lined in chiffon.
LIMITED EDITION. Wide, ankle-length trousers in soft velour with a high waist, zip fly and extended waistband with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, a low crotch and straight legs.
Leather ankle boots with suede details, a zip at one side, an adjustable tab with a metal buckle at the other and a loop at the back. Cotton twill linings and insoles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Leather ankle boots with suede details, a zip at one side, an adjustable tab with a metal buckle at the other and a loop at the back. Cotton twill linings and insoles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Thigh boots in soft leather with decorative seams, covered heels, and a zip on the inside at the bottom of the shaft. Satin linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9 cm.
Thigh boots in soft leather with decorative seams, covered heels, and a zip on the inside at the bottom of the shaft. Satin linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9 cm.
Long-sleeved dresses in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the top and a gently flared skirt. Ribbing around the neckline and picot trims at the neckline and cuffs.
Suede ankle boots with a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel approx. 5 cm.
Suede ankle boots with a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel approx. 5 cm.
Suede ankle boots with pointed toes and tassels at the back. Satin linings and leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
